::Zardus::

"Hmm..." Zardus sits back, considering this new idea. He finally nods. 
"Allright. Flight and tunneling would be an asset, yes. But what will 
you need for it?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:

experiments

creatures she
> was to make. "I've seen creatures like this before. What if we were 
to

snakes
> tunneling abilities?"  she again set the pad down. She had what she 
wanted,
